content: A little bit of ruby to communicate how I'm feeling today.

photo.alt:
Ruby interactive session:

irb(main):017:1* class Date
irb(main):018:2*   def to_pandemic_day
irb(main):019:2*     march_2020 = Date.parse('2020/03/01')
irb(main):020:2*     pandemic_days = Date.today - march_2020
irb(main):021:2*     "March #{pandemic_days.to_i}th, 2020"
irb(main):022:1*   end
irb(main):023:0> end
=> :to_pandemic_day
irb(main):024:0> Date.today.to_pandemic_day
=> "March 681th, 2020"
irb(main):025:0> puts "Today feels like it's #{Date.today.to_pandemic_day}"
Today feels like it's March 681th, 2020
=> nil
irb(main):026:0>
